authors.author: Elvina M. Hall John T. Grape

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Jesus paid it all, all to Him I owe; newline Sin had left a crimson stain, newline He washed it white as snow.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I hear the Savior say, newline "Thy strength indeed is small; newline Child of weakness watch and pray, newline Find in Me thine all in all."

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Lord, now indeed I find, newline Thy power and Thine alone; newline Can change the leper's spots newline And melt the heart of stone.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: For nothing good have I, newline Whereby Thy grace to claim; newline I'll wash my garments white, newline In the blood of Calvary's Lamb.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And when before the throne, newline I stand in Him complete; newline "Jesus died my soul to save," newline My lips shall still repeat.
